item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

item.title: How Feminism Became The Biggest Pagan Megachurch In The World
item.description: It has an object of worship, which is female autonomy, its own commandments, theological virtues, a sacrament, and even its own form of evangelization...

item.title: Trump Should Absolutely Model 1920s Immigration Policies Because They Worked
item.description: Restrictive immigration policies need not be racist — indeed, when properly framed and executed, they can be the very means of lowering the temperatur...

item.title: Deportation Is The Only ‘Due Process’ Illegal Aliens Deserve
item.description: How can there be a legal injury in removing a citizen of Somalia, Venezuela, Afghanistan, Mexico, or any other country, from the U.S.?

item.title: Trans Lawyer Who Asked SCOTUS To Redefine ‘Sex’ Can’t Produce A Definition When Asked
item.description: Trans-identifying lawyer Chase Strangio couldn't present a coherent definition of 'sex' without resorting to feelings and ideological babble.
